Reviews.Title: “Very happy, great place!”
Reviews.Author: Ralphyboy1962
Reviews.Content: stay recently visiting orlando doing usual family stuff disney universal etc cook relax home broke stumbled complex mango key nice community close action 4 miles disney quiet relax unwind units owned individuals rented vacations lived permanently pool heated real clean hot tub nice warm hardly company pool stayed unit 3 unit remodeled offered rent recently beautiful job flat screen tvs dvd players bedrooms living wife loved granite counter tops enjoyed couches screened porch pond fountain view nice evening morning coffee spot nice able park front door kids loved loft

Reviews.Title: “Great Value - Clean, Safe & Close to Disney!!!”

Reviews.Content: wonderful time mango key complex bedroom unit stayed description looked beautiful pictures 15 minutes disney conveniently located stores restaurants mom children concerns safety cleanliness unit clean safe owners flexible unit ready arrived checkin time definitely recommend friends family traveling disney
